item.description:
A brief introduction to A Course in Miracles will be provided including a discussion of how it came about, the key players in the early development of the Course, it's basic teachings, and information about resources available to help those studying the Course.  If you haven't come to a meetup yet or are new to the Course, this would be a good way to get introduced.

No materials required.  Just bring yourself and a curious mind.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: Introduction to ACIM
